flawed_nl_solution:
Teresa has 46 pencils because 14 + 35 = <<14+35=46>>46
Teresa gives away 36 pencils because 46 - 10 = <<46-10=36>>36
Each sibling gets 12 pencils because 36 / 3 = <<36/3=12>>12
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 49, not 46. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
